mapper.select: SELECT id, title, author, category, price, stock, created_at, updated_at FROM books ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO books (title, author, category, price, stock, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{title}, #{author}, #{category}, #{price}, #{stock}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE books SET title = #{title}, author = #{author}, category = #{category}, price = #{price}, stock = #{stock}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT category AS name, COUNT(*) AS value FROM books GROUP BY category ORDER BY value DESC
